features: Custom Functions: 16 items Mode Memory: 10 items Button/ Dial Customization: Green/Delete button: Green Button, Preview, One Push File Format, AE Lock, Enable AF Quick Dial: Smart Effect, Custom Image, Digital Filter, Aspect Ratio World Time: World Time settings for 75 cities (28 time zones)
